workshoptitle: A Few Advanced Features of Oracle GoldenGate Veridata

tutorials.title: Introduction to Oracle GoldenGate Veridata
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Use the Oracle GoldenGate Veridata Command-line Utilities
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through This lab describes how to accomplish the following tasks using Oracle GoldenGate Veridata command-line utilities:

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Set Up the Oracle GoldenGate Veridata Server on the Oracle WebLogic Platform for High Availability
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to set up the Oracle GoldenGate Veridata Server (version: 12.2.1.x) deployed on the Oracle WebLogic Platform for High Availability.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create Multiple Domains for Oracle GoldenGate Veridata
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to create multiple domains for Oracle GoldenGate Veridata

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Configure Auto Partitions
tutorials.description: This lab shows how to configure Automatic Row Partitioning in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Configure Database Partitions
tutorials.description: This lab shows how to configure Database Partitioning in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.
